item.title: Ghost Cheatsheet
item.description:
Getting started

  • brew install node
  • brew install python
  • brew install wget
  • pip install buster

Start a session

  • npm install
  • npm start

Update blog

  • buster generate
  • buster deploy

For full:
http://usmanjamil.co.uk/blog/setting-up-a-ghost-blog-on-github/#blog
item.dc:creator: Christopher Kummelstedt
item.content:encoded:
Getting started

  • brew install node
  • brew install python
  • brew install wget
  • pip install buster

Start a session

  • npm install
  • npm start

Update blog

  • buster generate
  • buster deploy

For full:
http://usmanjamil.co.uk/blog/setting-up-a-ghost-blog-on-github/#blog

item.title: Adventure.Begin
item.description:
After one month of Ruby and one week of the pre-course, the world may not ever be the same again.

Can't wait to rush in, but before I can fully commit, I need to finish at Global Business Labs - the NGO I am currently working for.

One week in
item.dc:creator: Christopher Kummelstedt
item.content:encoded:
After one month of Ruby and one week of the pre-course, the world may not ever be the same again.

Can't wait to rush in, but before I can fully commit, I need to finish at Global Business Labs - the NGO I am currently working for.

One week in Uganda and then I am going all into this new fab coding adventure.




Huzzah!
